title: Drawing, "Rendering for Bliss Family Mausoleum", 1901
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on heavy drawing board
signed: Signed in brown ink, lower right margin: Hughson Hawley
inscribed: Inscribed in brown ink, over the door: MDCCCCI; above pediment: B
description: An octagonal domed mausoleum in the Renaissance style, stands on a terrace, approached by a wide flight of steps flanked by potted trees.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Rendering for Bliss Family Mausoleum", 1901.
1901. Brush and watercolor, graphite on heavy drawing board. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1957-61-1.
